# data 読み込み 
## 必要パッケージ load
```{r, warning=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
```

## 作業folder 指定
```{r, eval=F}
setwd("環境に応じてファイルのパスを指定")
```


## data import
```{r}
filelists <- dir(pattern = "csv")
filelists
kagome <- read.csv(filelists[2], fileEncoding = "cp932")
tbl_df(kagome)
```
## kagome data 探索
```{r}
kagome %>% colnames()
kagome %>% dim()
kagome %>% str()
```


```{r}
filelists <- dir(pattern = "csv")
filelists
kagome <- read.csv(filelists[1], header=F, fileEncoding = "cp932")
tbl_df(kagome)
```
## kagome data 探索
```{r}
kagome %>% colnames()
kagome %>% dim()
kagome %>% str()
```
